response.overview: A French comedy-thriller about an unsuspecting man whose life is upended when a mysterious key lands in his hands. What appears as a trivial curiosity soon reveals its dangerous significance, dragging him into a labyrinth of criminal conspiracy and intrigue. As shadowy figures and relentless law enforcement close in, a series of mistaken identities, unexpected alliances, and perilous encounters ensue. Blending humor with suspense, the narrative demonstrates how one seemingly insignificant object can set off a cascade of unforeseen events and force a confrontation with both external threats and inner turmoil.
response.title: Rends-moi la clé!
